view.retailer

Class ViewHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.retailer.ViewHandler

  • public class ViewHandler
extends java.lang.Object

    The ViewHandler Class for the Warehouse

    This Class is responsible for opening the different views the Warehouse has access to.
    Author:
    Kenneth Jensen, Floring Bordei, Jaime Lopez, Dave Joe LÃª
